name: Gmail - Dense Preview Theme - More Dense
description:
Corrects the Google bar color difference between other Google products and the GMail preview theme. 
Also tightens up spacing in the header, action buttons and message table display to make the view a more dense without getting cluttered.
additional_info:
Release 1.5
- Minor code changes to reposition checkboxes in mail list views
Release 1.4
- Changed code to shrink header that caused contact layout to break
Release 1.3
- Removed new theme preview link
- Code cleanup
Release 1.2
- Improved position of action overlay messages at the top of the page
Release 1.1
- Condensed the header more
- Condensed the bottom action buttons
